general_advisory: Rainfall is expected during the next five days, spray only when the sky becomes clear and use a sticker for the spray solution. Farmers are advised to do proper arrangement for storing rainwater in the field. Take plant protection measures depending on the crop and weather conditions due to high humidity.

advisory: Collect hybrid or high yielding varieties of paddy with resistance to diseases and insect pests.
Apply phosphatic fertilizer in the dhaincha fields required for paddy cultivation.
Complete sowing of 10 Kg Maize hybrid seed per acre with appropriate spacing.
Spray Atrazine within 2 days of sowing to control weeds.
Sow seeds in line at appropriate spacing and apply fertilizers at sowing.
Treat seeds before sowing with recommended pesticides.
Apply specified pesticides in case of bacterial wilting.
Control fruit and shoot borer with neem-based pesticides.
Manage fruit rot infestation with recommended sprays.
Perform 1st weeding and top dressing with specified fertilizers.
Perform 1st weeding and top dressing with specified fertilizers.
